tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id INT,
    recipient_account_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    account_number INT,
    amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    transaction_type VARCHAR(10),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE hacker_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    hacker_id INT,
    account_number INT,
    log_description TEXT,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE transfer_records (
    transfer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id INT REFERENCES hacked_accounts(account_id),
    receiver_id INT REFERENCES hacked_accounts(account_id),
    transfer_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    transfer_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Victims (
    victim_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    victim_name VARCHAR(255),
    victim_email VARCHAR(255),
    victim_phone VARCHAR(20),
    victim_address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Hackers (
    hacker_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    hacker_name VARCHAR(255),
    hacker_email VARCHAR(255),
    hacker_phone VARCHAR(20),
    hacker_address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE TransferLogs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    hacker_id INT REFERENCES Hackers(hacker_id),
    victim_id INT REFERENCES Victims(victim_id),
    transfer_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    transfer_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE TransactionHistory (
    transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id INT REFERENCES BankAccounts(account_id),
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
);
